name: Don't Stop Cooking!
description:
Welcome to Don't Stop Cooking! The 2D cooking game where you must make meals from your recipe book. But be quick, because your boss has quite the short temper! Each meal completed before your boss becomes angry will calm him down a little along with giving you points. Try and cook more meals and get a high score!

  • This game was made for the 2022 Juice Jam!

Credits:

  • Programming/Game Design/SFX - Knocktane
  • Graphics/Art/Game Design - EOShadows
  • Music - EsperLihn
